name: awesome-selector
description: React, Javascript, and Typescript compatible selector.
author: Mostafa Mohammadzadeh

scripts.deploy: cd website && npm run build && npm run export && cd .. && find website/out -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; && find website/out -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \; && git add -A && git commit -m "[deployment auto commit]" && git ftp push
